name: Balloon Man (itch)
description:
(Best in fullscreen, press F11 after opening the game)

In this game you can:

-Complete all 6 original certified tested and yet to be rated levels

-Play with amazing physics

-Make your own levels (Feel free to share them in the comments!)

-Look at an ascii skater dude (best in Full HD (F11))

-Listen to the awesome soundtrack, including:

  • "Silence"
  • "Inner-Dialogue"
  • "Why Is Audio A Criteria I Thought This Was About Coding"
  •  "Help"

IMPORTANT: Please sing while playing this so the Audio Experience won't go below 0
